text: Dietfurt is a town in Neumarkt in Bavaria, Germany. The town is on the river Altm√ºhl, and is 38 km west of Regensburg, 30 km north of Ingolstadt, and is 364 meters above sea level. ==Overview== Dietfurt is known as the "Bavarian China" (, ), Chinese culture is the theme for Carnival in Dietfurt, and the city promotes other Chinese cultural activities such as courses in Qigong. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Bavaria's Chinese Carnival * * * * Category:Neumarkt (district)
title: Dietfurt
